text:
@JoeBiden Why are Democrats pulling so much for mail-in voting this time around? 

Coronavirus? Nope.

Convenience? Nope.

I’ll answer: It’s because they know you are an embarrassment and have zero chance of being Donald Trump in any debate or LEGITIMATELY at polls in November.
